system.effect: If any attack would lower this Pokémon to 0 Hit Points or less from full Hit Points, instead the Pokémon’s Hit Point value is set to 1. If any Critical Hit would lower this Pokémon to lower than 1 HP from HP above 1, instead the Pokémon's Hit Point value is set to 1. Pokémon with Critical Resistance do not gain Injuries from Massive Damage.
